hero.title: Price List Of Our Dental Services
hero.subtitle: The best price with the highest quality!

comparison.title: Comparison of Treatment Prices
comparison.description: In this simplified comparison, the prices of real quotes are used. One can see that the prices of treatment on average is about 65% cheaper in Montenegro than in the EU. How is that possible? This is because the costs of living in Montenegro is significantly lower than in the EU. Hence, come to Montenegro and save money on your dental treatment while enjoying one of the most beautiful and diverse countries in Europe.

competitiveAdvantage.title: Why Choose Us?
competitiveAdvantage.description: Experience the best dental care in beautiful Montenegro with top-quality materials and international connections. Enjoy significant savings, exceptional service, and the use of highest quality materials for your dental treatments.

personalizedCare.title: Personalized Care
personalizedCare.description: We provide personalized care tailored to your needs.

qualityService.title: Quality of Service
qualityService.description: Exquisite dental services with exceptional care.

competitivePricing.title: Competitive Pricing
competitivePricing.description: Significantly lower prices compared to other countries.

highQualityMaterials.title: High-Quality Materials
highQualityMaterials.description: Only the highest quality materials are used.

beautifulMontenegro.title: Beautiful Montenegro
beautifulMontenegro.description: Enjoy the picturesque beauty of Montenegro.

internationalConnections.title: International Connections
internationalConnections.description: Strong international connections for seamless travel.

pricingSection.title: Our Competitive Pricing
pricingSection.description: Discover the cost-effective dental solutions we offer. Our treatments not only ensure the highest quality and care but also come at a fraction of the cost compared to other countries. Explore our pricing options below to see why we are the best choice for your dental needs.

dentalImplants.title: Dental Implants
dentalImplants.description: If you are missing one or more teeth, dental implants are the solution for you.

zirconiumCrowns.title: Zirconium Crowns
zirconiumCrowns.description: Dental crowns restore the shape, size, and strength of a tooth.

ceramicCrowns.title: Ceramic Crowns
ceramicCrowns.description: Ceramic crowns provide a natural look and are a great option for front teeth.

allon4.title: All-on-4
allon4.description: The All-on-4 treatment concept provides a full-arch prosthesis on just four implants.

allon6.title: All-on-6
allon6.description: The All-on-6 treatment concept provides a full-arch prosthesis on six implants.

hollywoodSmile.title: Your Perfect Smile
hollywoodSmile.description: Achieve your perfect smile with the 'Hollywood Smile' treatment.

packagesSection.title: Our Most Popular Packages
packagesSection.description: Sorriso offers comprehensive packages for dental treatments in Montenegro. Choose the package that suits your needs. Choose quality, choose Sorriso.

packages.title: Minor Procedure
packages.description: One or more implants; a short stay of 3 days in Montenegro.
features: Transfers to and from the airport
2 nights stay in our clinic suite

packages.title: Standard Treatment
packages.description: Multiple implants or a bridge; trip to Montenegro.
features: 2 transfers to and from the airport
4 nights stay in our clinic suite

packages.title: Complete Dental Package
packages.description: A complete dental renovation; a trip lasts 5 to 7 days.
features: 2 transfers to and from the airport
7 nights stay in our clinic suite

packagesSection.note: * The above selected packages are an estimate and may vary depending on the patient's condition and treatment plan. A tailored treatment plan is at the heart of our approach which is why we offer a free consultation and a quote with no hidden costs upon consultation.

contactUs.title: Become one of our many satisfied patients!
contactUs.description: Say yes, and trust us – you won't regret it. Contact us and we will contact you as soon as possible!
